description: Supine RDI at 4% desat  [(Total number of apneas and hypopneas in supine body position associated with >= 4% desat) / (hours of sleep)]
calculation: rdi4ps  = 60*(hrembp4 + hnrbp4 + carbp4 + canbp4 + oarbp4 + oanbp4)/(remepbp+nremepbp)

hybrid.LABEL: Calculated - Overall Supine RDI at 4% desat
